Mehta Family School of DS&AI, IIT Guwahati

Bachelor of Science (Honors) Program

In addition to our flagship BTech program in DS & AI, we offer a globally accessible BSc (Hons) program through the Coursera platform. This meticulously designed program aims to prepare a talented pool of individuals, from across age, globe, and professional career, to tackle the growing challenges in the world around us using DS&AI.
  • Upon completion, students will possess the necessary qualifications, skills, and resources to pursue diverse roles within the technology sector. To offer flexibility, students admitted to the program can choose their own pace and customize their course of study.
  • They have the option to register for a reduced number of courses in a trimester if desired. The program offers multiple entry and exit points allowing students to tailor their learning experience to their needs.
  • Furthermore, there is an optional 4-week campus immersion plan at IIT Guwahati, providing hands-on training opportunities.
  • Whether you are a working professional seeking to enhance your skills in cutting-edge technologies or a recent Class XII graduate, this program is designed to cater to your needs.
